2185.quote: A leader is one who knows the way, goes the way, and shows the way.
2185.author: John C. Maxwell

2186.quote: Ultimately, leadership is not about glorious crowning acts. It's about keeping your team focused on a goal and motivated to do their best to achieve it, especially when the stakes are high and the consequences really matter. It is about laying the groundwork for others' success, and then standing back and letting them shine.
2186.author: Chris Hadfield

2187.quote: If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, you are a leader.
2187.author: John Quincy Adams

2188.quote: You have to think anyway, so why not think big?
2188.author: Donald Trump

2189.quote: I am not afraid of an army of lions led by a sheep; I am afraid of an army of sheep led by a lion.
2189.author: Alexander the Great

2190.quote: Leadership and learning are indispensable to each other.
2190.author: John F. Kennedy

2191.quote: Leadership is not about a title or a designation. It's about impact, influence and inspiration. Impact involves getting results, influence is about spreading the passion you have for your work, and you have to inspire team-mates and customers.
2191.author: Robin S. Sharma

2192.quote: Management is doing things right; leadership is doing the right things.
2192.author: Peter Drucker

2193.quote: The supreme quality for leadership is unquestionably integrity. Without it, no real success is possible, no matter whether it is on a section gang, a football field, in an army, or in an office.
2193.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

2194.quote: The quality of a leader is reflected in the standards they set for themselves.
2194.author: Ray Kroc

2195.quote: When you can't make them see the light, make them feel the heat.
2195.author: Ronald Reagan

2196.quote: Where there is no vision, there is no hope.
2196.author: George Washington Carver

2197.quote: A genuine leader is not a searcher for consensus but a molder of consensus.
2197.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

2198.quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
2198.author: Steve Jobs

2199.quote: Be a yardstick of quality. Some people aren't used to an environment where excellence is expected.
2199.author: Steve Jobs

2200.quote: A leader is a dealer in hope.
2200.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

2201.quote: Only the guy who isn't rowing has time to rock the boat.
2201.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

2202.quote: Leadership is solving problems. The day soldiers stop bringing you their problems is the day you have stopped leading them. They have either lost confidence that you can help or concluded you do not care. Either case is a failure of leadership.
2202.author: Colin Powell

2203.quote: When your values are clear to you, making decisions becomes easier.
2203.author: Roy E. Disney

2204.quote: A good leader takes a little more than his share of the blame, a little less than his share of the credit.
2204.author: Arnold H. Glasow

2205.quote: I know of no single formula for success. But over the years I have observed that some attributes of leadership are universal and are often about finding ways of encouraging people to combine their efforts, their talents, their insights, their enthusiasm and their inspiration to work together.
2205.author: Queen Elizabeth II

2206.quote: Don't find fault, find a remedy.
2206.author: Henry Ford

2207.quote: If the highest aim of a captain were to preserve his ship, he would keep it in port forever.
2207.author: Thomas Aquinas

2208.quote: Leadership is practiced not so much in words as in attitude and in actions.
2208.author: Harold S. Geneen

2209.quote: A leader is best when people barely know he exists, when his work is done, his aim fulfilled, they will say: we did it ourselves.
2209.author: Lao Tzu

2210.quote: Leadership is the capacity to translate vision into reality.
2210.author: Warren Bennis

2211.quote: Leadership is not about the next election, it's about the next generation.
2211.author: Simon Sinek

2212.quote: Speak softly and carry a big stick; you will go far.
2212.author: Theodore Roosevelt

2213.quote: If you think you can do a thing or think you can't do a thing, you're right.
2213.author: Henry Ford

2214.quote: Good management is the art of making problems so interesting and their solutions so constructive that everyone wants to get to work and deal with them.
2214.author: Paul Hawken

2215.quote: Leaders must be close enough to relate to others, but far enough ahead to motivate them.
2215.author: John C. Maxwell

2216.quote: It is better to lead from behind and to put others in front, especially when you celebrate victory when nice things occur. You take the front line when there is danger. Then people will appreciate your leadership.
2216.author: Nelson Mandela

2217.quote: Think little goals and expect little achievements. Think big goals and win big success.
2217.author: David Joseph Schwartz

2219.quote: Affirmation without discipline is the beginning of delusion.
2219.author: Jim Rohn

2220.quote: Enlightened leadership is spiritual if we understand spirituality not as some kind of religious dogma or ideology but as the domain of awareness where we experience values like truth, goodness, beauty, love and compassion, and also intuition, creativity, insight and focused attention.
2220.author: Deepak Chopra

2221.quote: The function of leadership is to produce more leaders, not more followers.
2221.author: Ralph Nader

2222.quote: People ask the difference between a leader and a boss. The leader leads, and the boss drives.
2222.author: Theodore Roosevelt

2223.quote: No man will make a great leader who wants to do it all himself or get all the credit for doing it.
2223.author: Andrew Carnegie

2224.quote: Leadership is unlocking people's potential to become better.
2224.author: Bill Bradley

2225.quote: High expectations are the key to everything.
2225.author: Sam Walton

2226.quote: Outstanding leaders go out of their way to boost the self-esteem of their personnel. If people believe in themselves, it's amazing what they can accomplish.
2226.author: Sam Walton

2227.quote: I think the currency of leadership is transparency. You've got to be truthful. I don't think you should be vulnerable every day, but there are moments where you've got to share your soul and conscience with people and show them who you are, and not be afraid of it.
2227.author: Howard Schultz

2228.quote: My attitude is never to be satisfied, never enough, never.
2228.author: Duke Ellington

2229.quote: When the best leader's work is done the people say, 'We did it ourselves.'
2229.author: Lao Tzu

2230.quote: Effective leadership is putting first things first. Effective management is discipline, carrying it out.
2230.author: Stephen Covey

2231.quote: A throne is only a bench covered with velvet.
2231.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

2232.quote: Leadership is the art of getting someone else to do something you want done because he wants to do it.
2232.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

2233.quote: I suppose leadership at one time meant muscles; but today it means getting along with people.
2233.author: Mahatma Gandhi

2234.quote: The speed of the leader is the speed of the gang.
2234.author: Mary Kay Ash

2235.quote: Effective leadership is not about making speeches or being liked; leadership is defined by results not attributes.
2235.author: Peter Drucker

2236.quote: A man who wants to lead the orchestra must turn his back on the crowd.
2236.author: Max Lucado

2237.quote: There is no greater name for a leader than mother or father. There is no leadership more important than parenthood.
2237.author: Sheri L. Dew

2238.quote: You don't lead by hitting people over the head - that's assault, not leadership.
2238.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

2239.quote: To me, leadership is about encouraging people. It's about stimulating them. It's about enabling them to achieve what they can achieve - and to do that with a purpose.
2239.author: Christine Lagarde

2240.quote: Management is efficiency in climbing the ladder of success; leadership determines whether the ladder is leaning against the right wall.
2240.author: Stephen Covey

2243.quote: Republican leadership in Congress let the energy companies write the energy bill that sent prices soaring, and has turned a blind eye to the struggles of working families trying to make ends meet.
2243.author: Sherrod Brown

2244.quote: In Britain, you do your job. When you do an American TV show, there is a sense of being one with the crew, and there is a leadership element, which was a learning curve for me because it is very different culturally. In Britain, you just do it, leave and say, 'Thanks.'
2244.author: Theo James

2245.quote: As members of Congress, we take an oath to uphold the Constitution and bear true faith and allegiance to the United States, not the Republican or Democratic party. I have been willing to stand up to my own leadership when it's in the national interest.
2245.author: Jackie Speier

2246.quote: Leadership consists of picking good men and helping them do their best.
2246.author: Chester W. Nimitz

2247.quote: I have always supported measures and principles and not men.
2247.author: Davy Crockett

2249.quote: I'm not a natural leader. I'm too intellectual; I'm too abstract; I think too much.
2249.author: Newt Gingrich

2250.quote: The exercise of power is determined by thousands of interactions between the world of the powerful and that of the powerless, all the more so because these worlds are never divided by a sharp line: everyone has a small part of himself in both.
2250.author: Vaclav Havel

2251.quote: I am a general. My soldiers are the keys and I have to command them.
2251.author: Vladimir Horowitz

2252.quote: If you care enough for a result, you will most certainly attain it.
2252.author: William James

2254.quote: Be careful the environment you choose for it will shape you; be careful the friends you choose for you will become like them.
2254.author: W. Clement Stone

2255.quote: The art of leadership is saying no, not saying yes. It is very easy to say yes.
2255.author: Tony Blair

2256.quote: If you have ideas, you have the main asset you need, and there isn't any limit to what you can do with your business and your life. Ideas are any man's greatest asset.
2256.author: Harvey S. Firestone

2257.quote: Leadership is diving for a loose ball, getting the crowd involved, getting other players involved. It's being able to take it as well as dish it out. That's the only way you're going to get respect from the players.
2257.author: Larry Bird

2258.quote: Leadership does not depend on being right.
2258.author: Ivan Illich

2259.quote: Go as far as you can see; when you get there, you'll be able to see farther.
2259.author: J. P. Morgan

2260.quote: It is rare to find a business partner who is selfless. If you are lucky it happens once in a lifetime.
2260.author: Michael Eisner

2261.quote: Getting in touch with your true self must be your first priority.
2261.author: Tom Hopkins

2262.quote: Many corporate leaders and employees have the right intentions, but it can be overwhelming when you consider how everything is affected from leadership styles, to organizational structure, to employee engagement, to customer service an marketplace.
2262.author: Simon Mainwaring

2263.quote: One of the lessons of leadership worth emphasizing is that you want to get to know other great leaders and take their advice. At some point in your development, it's only people who've been in the seat of having to be leaders who can help you in a deep way.
2263.author: Jim Yong Kim

2264.quote: The very essence of leadership is that you have to have vision. You can't blow an uncertain trumpet.
2264.author: Theodore Hesburgh

2265.quote: All of the great leaders have had one characteristic in common: it was the willingness to confront unequivocally the major anxiety of their people in their time. This, and not much else, is the essence of leadership.
2265.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

2266.quote: Leadership is a matter of having people look at you and gain confidence, seeing how you react. If you're in control, they're in control.
2266.author: Tom Landry

2267.quote: Leadership is an active role; 'lead' is a verb. But the leader who tries to do it all is headed for burnout, and in a powerful hurry.
2267.author: Bill Owens

2268.quote: Servant leadership is the foundation and the secret of Sam Walton's ability to achieve team synergy.
2268.author: Michael Bergdahl

2269.quote: I think it is quite dangerous for an organisation to think they can predict where they are going to need leadership. It needs to be something that people are willing to assume if it feels relevant, given the context of any situation.
2269.author: Margaret J. Wheatley

2270.quote: The 9/11 Commission recently released their report, citing important changes which need to be made to improve our nation's homeland security. I voiced my disappointment with the House leadership when this report was left until after the August recess for action.
2270.author: Leonard Boswell

2271.quote: Leadership is working with goals and vision; management is working with objectives.
2271.author: Russel Honore

2272.quote: Most leadership strategies are doomed to failure from the outset. As people have been noting for years, the majority of strategic initiatives that are driven from the top are marginally effective - at best.
2272.author: Peter Senge

2273.quote: Beginning under the Roman Empire, intellectual leadership in the West had been provided by Christianity. In the middle ages, who invented the first universities - in Paris, Oxford, Cambridge? The church.
2273.author: Nancy Pearcey

2274.quote: Lead yourself whenever your boss' leadership deteriorates. When your boss doesn't praise what you do, praise yourself. When your boss doesn't make you big, make yourself big. Remember, if you have done your best, failure does not count.
2274.author: Mario Teguh

2275.quote: The topic of leadership is a touchy one. A lot of leaders fail because they don't have the bravery to touch that nerve or strike that chord. Throughout my years, I haven't had that fear.
2275.author: Kobe Bryant

2276.quote: Globalisation means many other countries are asserting themselves and trying to take over leadership. Please don't ask Americans to let others assume the leadership of human exploration. We can do wonderful science on the Moon, and wonderful commercial things. Then we can pack up and move on to Mars.
2276.author: Buzz Aldrin

2277.quote: The country has sorted itself ideologically into the two political parties, and those partisan attachments have hardened in recent years. It will take an extraordinary event and act of leadership to break this partisan divide. I thought 9/11 might provide such an opportunity, but it was not seized.
2277.author: Thomas E. Mann

2278.quote: I think America is in trouble, but it's not beyond repair. But it's going to take leadership who sees the greatness of this country and who believes that, once again, we can be one nation under God.
2278.author: Mike Huckabee

2280.quote: The key to being a good manager is keeping the people who hate me away from those who are still undecided.
2280.author: Casey Stengel

2281.quote: The great leaders have always stage-managed their effects.
2281.author: Charles de Gaulle

2282.quote: How we think shows through in how we act. Attitudes are mirrors of the mind. They reflect thinking.
2282.author: David Joseph Schwartz

2283.quote: Obstacles are things a person sees when he takes his eyes off his goal.
2283.author: E. Joseph Cossman

2284.quote: Today a reader, tomorrow a leader.
2284.author: Margaret Fuller

2285.quote: Making good decisions is a crucial skill at every level.
2285.author: Peter Drucker

2286.quote: I look for what needs to be done. After all, that's how the universe designs itself.
2286.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

2287.quote: If you want a quality, act as if you already had it.
2287.author: William James

2288.quote: People buy into the leader before they buy into the vision.
2288.author: John C. Maxwell

2289.quote: No matter how carefully you plan your goals they will never be more than pipe dreams unless you pursue them with gusto.
2289.author: W. Clement Stone

2290.quote: If a window of opportunity appears, don't pull down the shade.
2290.author: Tom Peters

2291.quote: Management is about arranging and telling. Leadership is about nurturing and enhancing.
2291.author: Tom Peters

2292.quote: It is essential to employ, trust, and reward those whose perspective, ability, and judgment are radically different from yours. It is also rare, for it requires uncommon humility, tolerance, and wisdom.
2292.author: Dee Hock

2293.quote: People who enjoy meetings should not be in charge of anything.
2293.author: Thomas Sowell

2294.quote: There are three secrets to managing. The first secret is have patience. The second is be patient. And the third most important secret is patience.
2294.author: Chuck Tanner

2295.quote: Without initiative, leaders are simply workers in leadership positions.
2295.author: Bo Bennett

2296.quote: You have to lead people gently toward what they already know is right.
2296.author: Phil Crosby

2297.quote: Honor bespeaks worth. Confidence begets trust. Service brings satisfaction. Cooperation proves the quality of leadership.
2297.author: James Cash Penney

2298.quote: Leadership is getting someone to do what they don't want to do, to achieve what they want to achieve.
2298.author: Tom Landry

2299.quote: The signs of outstanding leadership appear primarily among the followers. Are the followers reaching their potential? Are they learning? Serving? Do they achieve the required results? Do they change with grace? Manage conflict?
2299.author: Max de Pree

2300.quote: Leadership is a privilege to better the lives of others. It is not an opportunity to satisfy personal greed.
2300.author: Mwai Kibaki

2301.quote: We live in a society obsessed with public opinion. But leadership has never been about popularity.
2301.author: Marco Rubio

2302.quote: In order to cultivate a set of leaders with legitimacy in the eyes of the citizenry, it is necessary that the path to leadership be visibly open to talented and qualified individuals of every race and ethnicity.
2302.author: Sandra Day O'Connor

2303.quote: Leadership is about doing the right thing, even if it going against a vast number of naysayers and mediocre people.
2303.author: N. R. Narayana Murthy

2304.quote: The cardinal responsibility of leadership is to identify the dominant contradiction at each point of the historical process and to work out a central line to resolve it.
2304.author: Mao Zedong

2305.quote: A good objective of leadership is to help those who are doing poorly to do well and to help those who are doing well to do even better.
2305.author: Jim Rohn

2306.quote: No institution can possibly survive if it needs geniuses or supermen to manage it. It must be organized in such a way as to be able to get along under a leadership composed of average human beings.
2306.author: Peter Drucker

2307.quote: Divorced from ethics, leadership is reduced to management and politics to mere technique.
2307.author: James MacGregor Burns

2308.quote: True leadership lies in guiding others to success. In ensuring that everyone is performing at their best, doing the work they are pledged to do and doing it well.
2308.author: Bill Owens

2309.quote: Vocational education programs have made a real difference in the lives of countless young people nationwide; they build self-confidence and leadership skills by allowing students to utilize their unique gifts and talents.
2309.author: Conrad Burns

2310.quote: Leaders of the future will have to be visionary and be able to bring people in - real communicators. These are things that women bring to leadership and executive positions, and it's going to be incredibly valuable and incredibly in demand.
2310.author: Anita Borg

2311.quote: If there is such a thing as good leadership, it is to give a good example. I have to do so for all the Ikea employees.
2311.author: Ingvar Kamprad

2312.quote: The person who takes the oath of office in the next four months will shape not just the next four years, but the next forty years of our nation. In these next four years, we need proven leadership, proven judgment and proven values. America needs four more years of President Barack Obama.
2312.author: Rahm Emanuel

2313.quote: It's a different era. Our job now is to show leadership and vision and to help the next generation of artists.
2313.author: Karen Kain

2314.quote: If a guy is intimidated by a woman in leadership, he has real problems with his own concepts of masculinity. That's a harsh statement, but I believe it to be true.
2314.author: Tony Campolo

2315.quote: Well, I think that - I think leadership's always been about two main things: imagination and courage.
2315.author: Paul Keating

2316.quote: Pay attention to those employees who respectfully ask why. They are demonstrating an interest in their jobs and exhibiting a curiosity that could eventually translate into leadership ability.
2316.author: Harvey Mackay

2317.quote: I don't think leadership demands 'yes' or 'no' answers; I think leadership is providing the forum for making the right decision, which doesn't demand unanimity.
2317.author: Arthur Ochs Sulzberger, Jr.

2318.quote: Leadership is absolutely about inspiring action, but it is also about guarding against mis-action.
2318.author: Simon Sinek

2319.quote: Uncertainty is a permanent part of the leadership landscape. It never goes away.
2319.author: Andy Stanley

2320.quote: There are good leaders who actively guide and bad leaders who actively misguide. Hence, leadership is about persuasion, presentation and people skills.
2320.author: Shiv Khera

2321.quote: A good cult delivers on its promises. A good cult nourishes the needs of its members, has transparency and integrity, and creates provisions for challenging its leadership openly. A good cult expands the freedoms and well-being of its members rather than limits them.
2321.author: Philip Zimbardo

2322.quote: I think that in any group activity - whether it be business, sports, or family - there has to be leadership or it won't be successful.
2322.author: John Wooden

2323.quote: Leadership is an intense journey into yourself. You can use your own style to get anything done. It's about being self-aware. Every morning, I look in the mirror and say, 'I could have done three things better yesterday.'
2323.author: Jeffrey R. Immelt

2324.quote: No matter how good you think you are as a leader, my goodness, the people around you will have all kinds of ideas for how you can get better. So for me, the most fundamental thing about leadership is to have the humility to continue to get feedback and to try to get better - because your job is to try to help everybody else get better.
2324.author: Jim Yong Kim

2325.quote: Leadership is something you earn, something you're chosen for. You can't come in yelling, 'I'm your leader!' If it happens, it's because the other guys respect you.
2325.author: Ben Roethlisberger

2326.quote: The task of leadership is not to put greatness into humanity, but to elicit it, for the greatness is already there.
2326.author: John Buchan

2327.quote: Leadership consists not in degrees of technique but in traits of character; it requires moral rather than athletic or intellectual effort, and it imposes on both leader and follower alike the burdens of self-restraint.
2327.author: Lewis H. Lapham

2328.quote: You have to enable and empower people to make decisions independent of you. As I've learned, each person on a team is an extension of your leadership; if they feel empowered by you they will magnify your power to lead.
2328.author: Tom Ridge

2329.quote: Sport fosters many things that are good; teamwork and leadership.
2329.author: Daley Thompson

2330.quote: The Leadership Training Institute of America trains and equips young men and women to be leaders with high standards of personal morality and integrity.
2330.author: Michael Burgess

2331.quote: At that time, the army leadership said the implementation of this agreement would allow everyone, including the IRA, to take its political objectives forward by peaceful and democratic means.
2331.author: Gerry Adams

2332.quote: You can never stop and as older people, we have to learn how to take leadership from the youth and I guess I would say that this is what I'm attempting to do right now.
2332.author: Angela Davis

2333.quote: Leadership is getting players to believe in you. If you tell a teammate you're ready to play as tough as you're able to, you'd better go out there and do it. Players will see right through a phony. And they can tell when you're not giving it all you've got.
2333.author: Larry Bird

2334.quote: The fact that we are here today to debate raising America's debt limit is a sign of leadership failure. America has a debt problem and a failure of leadership. Americans deserve better. I, therefore, intend to oppose the effort to increase America's debt.
2334.author: Barack Obama

2335.quote: In giving us children, God places us in a position of both leadership and service. He calls us to give up our lives for someone else's sake - to abandon our own desires and put our child's interests first. Yet, according to His perfect design, it is through this selflessness that we can become truly fulfilled.
2335.author: Charles Stanley

2336.quote: God will never direct us to be prideful, arrogant and unforgiving, immoral or slothful or full of fear. We step into these things because we are insensitive to the leadership of the Holy Spirit within us.
2336.author: Charles Stanley

2337.quote: I want American Dream growth - lots of new businesses, well-paying jobs, and American leadership in new industries, like clean energy and biotechnology.
2337.author: William J. Clinton

2338.quote: Leadership can't be fabricated. If it is fabricated and rehearsed, you can't fool the guys in the locker room. So when you talk about leadership, it comes with performance. Leadership comes with consistency.
2338.author: Junior Seau

2339.quote: Washington's answer to a self-inflicted financial crisis reminded Americans why they so deeply distrust the political class. The 'fiscal cliff' process was secretive and sloppy, and the nation's so-called leadership lacked the political courage to address our root problems: joblessness and debt.
2339.author: Ron Fournier

2340.quote: Leadership must be likeable, affable, cordial, and above all emotional. The fashion of authoritarian leadership is gone. Football is about life. You can't be angry all day.
2340.author: Vicente del Bosque

2341.quote: Leadership is all about taking people on a journey. The challenge is that most of the time, we are asking people to follow us to places we ourselves have never been.
2341.author: Andy Stanley

2342.quote: I think there is probably no better person to aspire to emulate than Steve Jobs and what he has done at Apple in terms of his leadership, his innovation, not settling for mediocrity.
2342.author: Howard Schultz

2343.quote: I am the wealthiest man, not just in Europe, but in the whole world. I collect emotions. I am wealthy in that the people of Russia have twice entrusted me with the leadership of a great nation such as Russia - I believe that is my greatest wealth.
2343.author: Vladimir Putin

2344.quote: I vividly remember a conversation I had many years ago in 1974, which marked a turning point in my leadership journey. I was sitting at a Holiday Inn with my friend, Kurt Campmeyer, when he asked me if I had a personal growth plan. I didn't. In fact, I didn't even know you were supposed to have one.
2344.author: John C. Maxwell

2345.quote: There's the assumption being made by the national security advisers to the Obama administration that the North Korean leadership is not suicidal, that they know they will be obliterated if they attacked the United States. But I would point that everything in South Korea and Japan is well within range of what they might want to do.
2345.author: Oliver North

2346.quote: In a world of complex threats, our security and leadership depends on all elements of our power - including strong and principled diplomacy.
2346.author: Barack Obama

2347.quote: I hope telling the story of how I went from being a single mom to serving in the Texas State Senate to running for governor will remind others that with the right leadership in government, where you start has nothing to do with how far you go.
2347.author: Wendy Davis

2348.quote: I believe in servant leadership, and the servant always asks, 'Where am I needed most?'
2348.author: Mike Pence

2349.quote: We are looking for a set of personal characteristics that predict success, the first and foremost of which is perseverance in the face of challenges. We also look for the ability to influence and motivate others who share your values, strong problem-solving ability, and leadership.
2349.author: Wendy Kopp

2350.quote: I think one of the keys to leadership is recognizing that everybody has gifts and talents. A good leader will learn how to harness those gifts toward the same goal.
2350.author: Ben Carson

2351.quote: Inability to make decisions is one of the principal reasons executives fail. Deficiency in decision-making ranks much higher than lack of specific knowledge or technical know-how as an indicator of leadership failure.
2351.author: John C. Maxwell

2352.quote: The trouble with the Labour Party leadership and the trade union leadership, they're quite willing to applaud millions on the streets of the Philippines or in Eastern Europe, without understanding the need to also produce millions of people on the streets of Britain.
2352.author: Arthur Scargill

2353.quote: Leadership cannot really be taught. It can only be learned.
2353.author: Harold S. Geneen

2354.quote: The task of the leader is to get his people from where they are to where they have not been.
2354.author: Henry A. Kissinger

2355.quote: Leadership - leadership is about taking responsibility, not making excuses.
2355.author: Mitt Romney

2356.quote: Leadership is the other side of the coin of loneliness, and he who is a leader must always act alone. And acting alone, accept everything alone.
2356.author: Ferdinand Marcos

2357.quote: Management's job is to convey leadership's message in a compelling and inspiring way. Not just in meetings, but also by example.
2357.author: Jeffrey Gitomer

2358.quote: Don't necessarily avoid sharp edges. Occasionally they are necessary to leadership.
2358.author: Donald Rumsfeld

2359.quote: The Dalai Lama. He is a very wise man of great inner peace who believes that happiness is the purpose of our lives. Through his teachings and leadership, he continues to make this world a better place in which to live.
2359.author: Sidney Sheldon

2360.quote: A functioning, robust democracy requires a healthy educated, participatory followership, and an educated, morally grounded leadership.
2360.author: Chinua Achebe

2361.quote: The Washington leadership has put aside non-proliferation programmes and devoted its energies and resources to driving the country to war by extraordinary deceit, then trying to manage the catastrophe it created in Iraq.
2361.author: Noam Chomsky

2362.quote: I wish I had played team sports. I think every kid should. Teamwork builds character - teaches people about leadership and cooperation.
2362.author: Mo Rocca

2363.quote: To succeed in business it is necessary to make others see things as you see them.
2363.author: Aristotle Onassis

2364.quote: It is, after all, the responsibility of the expert to operate the familiar and that of the leader to transcend it.
2364.author: Henry A. Kissinger

2365.quote: Such highly qualitative leadership is demanded especially in the realm of the fostering of right international relations. Here the demand is simply irresistible.
2365.author: John Raleigh Mott

2366.quote: I start with the premise that the function of leadership is to produce more leaders, not more followers.
2366.author: Ralph Nader
